problems.text: Find the 3rd term of the sequence: 25, 50, 100, ...
problems.hint: This is a geometric sequence. Each term is multiplied by 2 to get the next.
steps: Use the formula: an = a1 × r^(n-1)

problems.text: Find the 4th term of the sequence: 3, 9, 27, ...
problems.hint: Each term is multiplied by 3. Find the fourth term.
steps: Use the formula: an = a1 × r^(n-1)

problems.text: Find the 5th term of the sequence: 4, 8, 16, ...
